title: MR equals ATC in PC long run equilibrium

content.prompt: Which of the following is true if a perfectly competitive market is in long-run equilibrium?

choices.label: Marginal revenue is equal to average total cost.
Price is not equal to marginal revenue.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
